law.catch_line: Notwithstanding § 13-916(b) of this subtitle, for any Class E (truck) vehicle, the annual registrat...
law.text:
Notwithstanding § 13-916(b) of this subtitle, for any Class E (truck) vehicle, the annual registration fee is $63.75 if:
The manufacturer's rated capacity is 3/4 ton or less; and
The maximum gross vehicle weight is 7,000 pounds or less.
